mapper.select:
SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}
SELECT * FROM t_ware_outmainorder WHERE f_shipment_number= #{shipmentNumber} AND f_is_delete = 0
SELECT * FROM t_ware_outmainorder WHERE f_contract_number= #{contractNumber} AND f_is_delete = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ware_outmainorder SET f_is_delete = 1 WHERE f_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.f_plate_number, o.f_shipment_number, o.f_shipment_date, o.f_total_quality, o.f_delivery_date, o.f_transport_type, o.f_carrier, o.f_phone_number, o.f_carrier_unit, o.f_carrier_unit_code, o.f_reservation_date, o.f_shipment_remark, o.f_contract_number, o.f_contract_date, o.f_outbound_ware_code, o.f_outbound_ware, o.f_arrival_ware_code, o.f_arrival_ware, o.f_arrival_require, o.f_delivery_require, o.f_remark, o.f_out_complite_date, o.f_status, o.f_created_date, o.f_created_person_id, o.f_created_person, o.f_updated_date, o.f_updated_person_id, o.f_updated_person, o.f_forward_unit_code, o.f_forward_unit, o.f_purchase_unit_code, o.f_purchase_unit, o.f_nc_ware_code, o.f_nc_ware, o.f_outchan_code, o.f_load_date, o.f_transport_code, o.f_is_delete, o.f_is_urgent, o.f_priority_level, o.f_id, o.f_order_number, od.f_id, od.f_mater_code, od.f_mater_name, od.f_quality_box, od.f_price_notax, od.f_amount_notax, od.f_tax_rate, od.f_tax_amount, od.f_amount, od.f_mater_version, od.f_mater_cigbrand FROM t_ware_outmainorder AS o LEFT JOIN t_ware_outorderdetail AS od ON o.f_id = od.f_mainorder_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_outtraylocalmap AS odm ON odm.f_orderdetail_id = od.f_id WHERE odm.f_batch_no = #{batchNo} GROUP BY od.f_id
mapper.update: UPDATE t_ware_outmainorder SET f_status = 3 WHERE f_id = #{id}
UPDATE t_ware_outmainorder SET f_status = 2 WHERE f_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.f_order_number, o.f_shipment_number, o.f_shipment_date, o.f_plate_number, o.f_total_quality, o.f_delivery_date, o.f_transport_type, o.f_carrier, o.f_phone_number, o.f_carrier_unit, o.f_carrier_unit_code, o.f_reservation_date, o.f_shipment_remark, o.f_contract_number, o.f_contract_date, o.f_outbound_ware_code, o.f_outbound_ware, o.f_arrival_ware_code, o.f_arrival_ware, o.f_arrival_require, o.f_delivery_require, o.f_remark, o.f_out_complite_date, o.f_status, o.f_created_date, o.f_created_person_id, o.f_created_person, o.f_updated_date, o.f_updated_person_id, o.f_updated_person, o.f_forward_unit_code, o.f_forward_unit, o.f_purchase_unit_code, o.f_purchase_unit, o.f_nc_ware_code, o.f_nc_ware, o.f_outchan_code, o.f_load_date, o.f_transport_code, o.f_is_delete, o.f_is_urgent, o.f_priority_level, o.f_orign_method, od.f_mater_name, od.f_mater_code, od.f_quality_box, od.f_amount_notax, od.f_price_notax, od.f_tax_rate, od.f_tax_amount, od.f_amount, od.f_mater_version, od.f_mater_cigbrand, odm.f_id, odm.f_orderdetail_id, odm.f_receivor_id, odm.f_receivor_name, odm.f_receive_date, odm.f_cigsmoke_quality, odm.f_realout_quality, odm.f_tray_rfid, odm.f_local_code, odm.f_local_rfid, odm.f_status as localmapStatus, odm.f_batch_no, odm.f_sole_code, odm.f_tray_code, odm.f_ware_method, odm.f_local_id, odm.f_ware_area, odm.f_cigtype FROM t_ware_outmainorder AS o LEFT JOIN t_ware_outorderdetail AS od ON o.f_id = od.f_mainorder_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_outtraylocalmap AS odm ON od.f_id = odm.f_orderdetail_id WHERE odm.f_tray_rfid = #{trayRfid}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ware_outorderdetail t1 WHERE t1.f_mainorder_id = #{mainorderId} AND t1.f_quality_box =0
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ware_outmainorder t WHERE t.f_is_delete=0 AND (t.f_status=1 OR t.f_status = 2) AND t.f_plate_number =#{plateNumber}
